page.title: 06A DUNGANNON BOY'S SATURDAY
page.content: While descusing the topic of Life Styles in preparation for the project, there was unanimous agreement amoung all taking part that the best day of the week for everyone was Saturday. In order to analyse why this was so, it was decided to make a survey over a period of weeks. Each boy, who was actually involved in the project, recorded how he spent his time each Saturday. From these records we were able to form a reasonably clear picture of how the average eleven year old school boy enjoys his Saturday. To help illustrate our findings we have invented a character called{Joe {Average}and he will tell you how he spends a typical Saturday in his life.
